full_sentence: You'd think murdering black people would make cops look bad. Strange that.
What a pile of fucking garbage Oxford uni is! Full of brownies!

What goes through their mind to do something like that. Was this just an educational experience for the kids and a trans wanted to do it? Okay. Now if that's the case, why is a trans telling 5 year olds about their fucking mental illness.

oh the Irish, with their nice accents and rolling scenes but as people they are so far from being nice and beautiful! It is such a shame because I want to take in all i can while i'm here but there are too many of them just walking around. It's like every time i look around they are coming into my eyeline, it makes me sick
